long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Guidy" is a Chrome extension designed to empower users in creating comprehensive user guides effortlessly, without the need for coding skills. With Guidy, you can craft intuitive and interactive user guides directly within web browser, streamlining the process of providing assistance and instructions to their audience.

No-code User Guide Creation: Guidy simplifies the user guide creation process by eliminating the need for complex coding. Through an intuitive interface, users can easily design user guides tailored to their specific needs.

Seamless Integration: Once the user guide is complete, Guidy offers seamless integration options, allowing users to export the generated code with a single click. This exported code can be effortlessly integrated into any web page or application, ensuring a smooth transition from creation to implementation.
